Docs.summary: The Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging namespace contains types that support the logging objects in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] and provides a simple log listener that directs logging output to file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about the `My` logging objects, see <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Logging.Log>.
